com.ae.apps.lib.contacts.service

Interface AeContactService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactService, MockContactService

    public interface AeContactService
    Specification for a DAO that accesses the Android Contacts API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContactIdFromAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Get contactId corresponding to an "address"
      long getContactIdFromRawContactId(java.lang.String rawContactId)
      Returns the contactId when given the rawContactId which is used in the master table
      java.util.List<MessageInfo> getContactMessages(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns list of messages for this contact
      java.util.List<PhoneNumberInfo> getContactPhoneDetails(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the list of phone numbers for this contact if it exists
      android.graphics.Bitmap getContactPhoto(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns the contact photo
      java.util.List<ContactInfo> getContacts(boolean addContactsWithPhoneNumbers)
      Read all contacts from the phone's contact database
